name: Creepy Cards
description:
Get your spook on with this Creepy Cards game.

The game is a classic memory game, with a twist! Turn over the cards and make matches. When you turn over a card one of the cards will be haunted. You can't flip it unless you collect one of the crosses by clicking on one on the walls to exorcise the card. When you make a pair those cards will leave the table. Don't let the ghosts get to you, you have 5 times to get hit before game over! Clear the table to win! 

Controls:

Use mouse to look around the room and aim at cards and ghosts. 
Left Click over cards to flip them over. Match the cards!
Left Click on ghosts to destroy it. 
Left Click on crosses to collect it for card exorcisms. 
Hold Right Mouse Button to zoom in a bit. 
 Escape to Exit 

Made for Scream Jam 2020
